title: How does the iPhone 12 Pro make a difference in other phones? - Quora

response.answer_text: The difference is iPhone 12 pro have world first smartphone processor with 5nm process technology and thanks to A14 bionic processor and iPhone 12 pro display supports ceremic shield that gives 4x more durability when you are drop iPhone 12 pro and another difference is it's new wireless charging system called”magsafe”.
